uts.wsd.teamtwo.rest

Class HotelRestService

  • java.lang.Object
    • uts.wsd.teamtwo.rest.HotelRestService

  • @Path(value="")
public class HotelRestService
extends java.lang.Object
    The REST service which provides access to the collection of Hotels stored by the server. Responses are provided in XML format.
    Author:
    Deinyon L Davies

      • searchHotels

        @Path(value="/hotels")
@GET
@Produces(value="application/xml")
public Hotels searchHotels(@QueryParam(value="name")
                                    java.lang.String name,
                                    @QueryParam(value="country")
                                    java.lang.String country,
                                    @QueryParam(value="city")
                                    java.lang.String city)
        Generates a set of hotels, filtered by all (may be null) of the parameters.
        Parameters:
        name - The partial name of the matching hotel (match will contain 'name' in its name.
        country - The country of the matching hotel.
        Returns:
        The set of hotels that has been filtered by the parameters.
